name: gcp_turbinia_ts
description:
Process a GCP persistent disk with Turbinia and send output to Timesketch.

This processes a disk that is already in the project where Turbinia exists. If you want to copy the disk from another project, use the gcp_turbinia_disk_copy_ts recipe.
short_description: Processes an existing GCP persistent disk in the Turbinia project and sends results to Timesketch.
args: Name of GCP project the disk exists in
The GCP zone the disk to process (and Turbinia workers) are in
Name of GCP persistent disk to process
Run all Turbinia processing jobs instead of a faster subset
Sketch to which the timeline should be added
Optional custom password to decrypt Timesketch credential file with
Whether to wait for timelines to finish processing.
